title: Elementary Science Blended Learning Support Strategies Through Remote Instructional Supervision

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for strengthening elementary science education supervision competencies targeting working professionals, with remote learning via mobile devices on weekdays and offline workshops on weekends

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more strategies to effectively deliver core concepts of the elementary science curriculum in a remote environment.
Learners can systematically manage student activity records by applying smartphone-based tools (e.g., Google Classroom, KakaoTalk).
Learners can submit improved remote supervision strategies incorporating peer feedback through offline workshops held every two weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
